column1: Daily Weather Observations for Watsonia, Victoria for December 2024
Prepared at 13:01 UTC on Friday  8 August 2025   IDCJDW3079.202412
Most observations taken from Viewbank, other observations taken from Melbourne Airport.

This same data is also available under the location name Viewbank". Some cloud observations are from automated equipment; these are somewhat different to those made by a human observer and may not appear every day."

Cloud, evaporation and sunshine observations are from Melbourne Airport {station 086282}
